00018 #include <math.h>
00019 #include <boost/tokenizer.hpp>
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <csgapplication.h>
00023 #include <trajectorywriter.h>
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 using namespace votca::csg;
00027 
00028 class CsgMapApp
00029     : public CsgApplication
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     string ProgramName() { return "csg_map"; }
00033     void HelpText(ostream &out) {
00034         out << "Map a reference trajectory to a coarse-grained trajectory\n"
00035             "This program can be used to map a whole trajectory or only\n"
00036             "create an initial configuration for a coarse-grained run.";
00037     }
00038 
00039     bool DoTrajectory() { return true;}
00040     bool DoMapping() { return true;}
00041 
00042     void Initialize() {
00043         CsgApplication::Initialize();
00044         AddProgramOptions()
00045             ("out", boost::program_options::value<string>(),
00046                 "  output file for coarse-grained trajectory");
00047     }
00048     
00049     bool EvaluateOptions() {
00050         CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00051         CheckRequired("trj", "no trajectory file specified");
00052         CheckRequired("out", "need to specify output trajectory");
00053         return true;
00054     }
00055 
00056     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00057 
00058     void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref) {
00059         _writer->Write(top);
00060     }
00061     void EndEvaluate() {
00062         _writer->Close();
00063         delete _writer;
00064     }
00065 
00066 protected:
00067     TrajectoryWriter *_writer;
00068 };
00069 
00070 void CsgMapApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom)
00071 {
00072     string out = OptionsMap()["out"].as<string>();
00073     cout << "writing coarse-grained trajectory to " << out << endl;
00074     _writer = TrjWriterFactory().Create(out);
00075     if(_writer == NULL)
00076         throw runtime_error("output format not supported: " + out);
00077         
00078     _writer->Open(out);
00079 };
00080 
00081 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00082 {
00083     CsgMapApp app;
00084     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00085 }
